items.sentence: Tom, Mary, John and Alice all made for the door.
It was much easier for Tom to do it than for us.
I don't remember anything. I must've passed out.
I still haven't found a place to live in Boston.
Many of our employees can't even pay their rent.
Tom is the one that needs to make that decision.
I don't speak French as well as I speak English.
I speak French about as well as I speak English.
How long has it been since you've talked to Tom?
I'm studying several languages at the same time.
